content.value:
Amy Schumer reveals one Oscars joke she wasn‚Äôt allowed to say ‚Äî ‚ÄúDon‚Äôt Look Up is the name of a movie? More like don‚Äôt look down the barrel of Alec Baldwin‚Äôs shotgun‚Äù

‚ÄúI wasn‚Äôt allowed to say any of that, but you can just come up & [slap] someone‚Äù

(via: variety.com/2022/film/news‚Ä¶)

content: I'm still thinking about how this confirms that the Oscars have an intensive joke approval process, that was actively used to veto jokes in poor taste, and yet the committee decided "a joke making fun of a Black woman's auto-immune disease" was okay
